nodes.text: A crystal forest was created in 3 ABY on the Forest Moon of Endor when the sentient creature called Gracca used the magical powers of his Crystal Cloak to plant several crystal seeds on the Floating Mountain. Several crystal spires emerged from the ground around the Ewoks Wicket Wystri Warrick and Latara, who had come to the mountain to recover the crystal cloak. During the skirmish that followed, Gracca inadvertently flew into one of the spires, causing many of them to fall down and trap him within them.
